sentences.english: Which type of advertisement that you think it is not suitable to use photo retouching technique?
sentences.chinese: 请问那类广告是你最不能接受广告中相片经编修的？

sentences.english: Compilers played a decisive role in the development of Huizhou genealogies.
sentences.chinese: 编修者在家谱修撰中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: So it's Redaction Criticism is what you'll see in the scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 所以学术界中说的是编修批判。

sentences.english: Discussion and talk pages are much less formal and generally should not be copy-edited .
sentences.chinese: 讨论与聊天页面较不正式，通常无须编修。

sentences.english: Work Program in 2003 – First Stage. The Bureau of Standards, Metrology and …
sentences.chinese: 九十二年第一期编修国家标准工作计画。

sentences.english: The Renaissance Team ex-members will also edit as themselves.
sentences.chinese: 原来复兴会的成员也会以个人名义进行编修。

sentences.english: Reasons why you are not accepting those products being photo retouched?
sentences.chinese: 请问你不能接受该类产品的相片经编修的原因？

definition: Imperial Hanlin Academy, lasting from Tang dynasty until 1911
members of the Hanlin Imperial Academy 翰林院, employed as imperial secretaries from the Tang onwards
Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
same as 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1] Book of History
title of the temporary position in the Hanlin Academy, conferred to meritorious candidates until the next examination
successful candidate in the highest imperial civil service examination/palace graduate
office set up in 1914 to compile official history of the Qing dynasty
